items.sentence: Why do you think Tom likes baseball so much?
Tom told me he didn\'t want to go to Boston.
Tom told me he thought he couldn\'t do that.
Tom and Mary were pinned under the wreckage.
Tom and Mary were talking about the weather.
Tom announced that he was quitting football.
Tom anticipated that there would be trouble.
Tom apologized for calling so late at night.
I can\'t forgive Tom for behaving like that.
I can\'t go to the concert with you tonight.
Tom gave Mary his jacket and she hung it up.
Tom gave each student in his class a pencil.
Tom gave the robbers everything they wanted.
Maybe that\'s something I can help you with.
Maybe there\'s someone else who can help us.
Tom can\'t do anything without Mary\'s help.
Tom stared into Mary\'s eyes and kissed her.
Tom and Mary don\'t seem to know what to do.
Tom and Mary don\'t want to travel together.
I knew you wouldn\'t fail your driving test.
